task.title: Sorting name
task.shortdesc: Sorting title of a record-level entity. Taken from MARC245with initial articles removed.

row.entry: Do not repeat on related HumanMadeObject.
Do not repeat on related HumanMadeObject.
Do not repeat on nested members_exemplified_by → HumanMadeObject.

section.title: Source data
section.codeblock: --- name: SortingName sampleBibs: - 3 - 9447 fieldSpec: - 245abfghknps trimPunctuation: true scriptInclusion: NONE

step.cmd: Determine the number of nonfiling characters from the MARC 245 second indicator value.

choices.choice: If the second indicator is missing/corrupt or not castable as an integer, set the value to 0.
Else, extract the value of 245 second indicator as an integer.

substep.cmd: Using the string value of the main title, take the substring using the number of nonfiling characters extracted from245second indicator as offset.
